title: Sampler, ca. 1760
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: cross, tent, satin, stem, plush and couching stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Verse and scene showing a woman with animals, birds, and insects; crowned thistle, crowned rose surrounded by an angular border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
